title: GDG DevFest New Delhi 2015 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest New Delhi 2015 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in New Delhi!

title: GDG DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: Google Developers Groups New Delhi and BVP are proud to announce the annual GDG DevFest which is the biggest Google related event in New Delhi carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **8th of October** at **Coding Ninjas**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest New Delhi 2016 announced! The biggest conference about Google technologies in New Delhi will take on **October 8** at Coding Ninjas.
